amendment.description: To require the Department of Labor to cease the implementation of closing procedures for the Department of Labor Employment and Training Administration regional office in New York City, New York, and the Employment and Training Administration affiliate offices in Seattle, Washington, Kansas City, Missouri, and Denver, Colorado until September 30, 2004.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1638 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1638 proposed by Senator Specter for Senator Bond to Amendment SA 1542. (consideration: CR 9/11/2003 S11321-11324; text: CR 9/11/2003 S11324) To require the Department of Labor to cease the implementation of closing procedures for the Department of Labor Employment and Training Administration regional office in New York City, New York, and the Employment and Training Administration affiliate offices in Seattle, Washington, Kansas City, Missouri, and Denver, Colorado until September 30, 2004.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1638 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1638 proposed by Senator Specter for Senator Bond to Amendment SA 1542.
